extension.name: shopfunctionsf.php
extension.author: RuposTel.com
extension.description:
shopfunctionsf upgrade for before VM3.0.16 to support Joomla 3.5.1, works on 3.0.0 to 3.0.14.
Do not install on later VM versions!
CREATE A BACKUP OF YOUR /components/com_virtuemart/helpers/shopfunctionsf.php IF NEEDED ! Report issues to rupostel.com
